topic.title: How to start up your own ZeroID?
topic.body: Anyone got any tips? I was looking through the files of the original ZeroID zite and couldn't really figure much out of it. Anyone got a link to the original download from GitHub? Thanks.

1601407298_1LGjkJTGUREur9dJyVvPqVRDJPVHq.body: Anyone got any clue, I remember being able to find a link to a centralised database within the ZeroID files but cannot seem to do so now.
Anyone? There used to be a file I think and you had to change the link url to change the database location but I'm unsure now.

1600902116_1A2q7qJ8xFsE2p1sdzkN87rQQx5Hd.body: Hey, lost my username so had to create a new one, anyone still interested?
